forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle after 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 55. West southwest wind 5 to 12 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds with a gentle embrace of sunlight, illuminating the streets with a clarity that invites exploration. The temperature hovers comfortably, around the mid-60s, as a mild westerly breeze dances through the city, offering just enough respite to appreciate the beauty of the day. As the sun arcs higher, it will begin an inevitable descent, leading to a gradual chill that settles in as evening approaches. The horizon remains largely unmarred by the familiar blanket of fog, yet the promise of patchy drizzle lurks just beyond midnight, hinting at a soft shift in the weather as clouds gather in anticipation of the night.

Adventurous souls may find delight in an afternoon stroll through the vibrant neighborhoods, perhaps stopping at a quaint café to sip on a warm brew while people-watching, the energy of the city swirling around. As the light wanes and the cooler temperatures creep in, layering up will be wise, wrapping yourself in something cozy to ward off the chill. Prepare for the evening with a casual outing—consider a mellow visit to the local bookstore or a quiet dinner at one of the neighborhood eateries as the clouds begin to gather, ready to usher in the night with a soft, drizzly embrace.
